description.ko: 생물 발광 이끼 심장을 통해 '자연의 숨쉬는 빛'을 표현한 심해 유기 구조체입니다.
description.en: A deep-sea organic structure representing the 'Breathing light of nature' through a bioluminescent moss-heart.

prompt: A majestic, breathing arboreal heart-structure suspended in a light-starved oceanic cavern, composed of translucent emerald-moss fibers and flowing amber sap pathways. The core is an intricate network of #FFE66D glowing neural filaments pulsing rhythmically. Surrounding the structure are #7FB069 bioluminescent tendrils and floating #E6F2E1 spores, drifting in #2D5A3D dark green water. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Heavy subsurface scattering on the mossy membranes, volumetric light shafts piercing the depths, cinematic lighting, and sharp focus on the microscopic flow of liquid light.
